title: Ep261 Luck of the Irish Crimes
description:
This week, the gals test their luck chatting about some strange happenings on the Emerald Isle. Topics include a magical goose, shamrocks versus clovers, and a seemingly unstoppable spate of bombings. Pick up a bottle of Winc's House of Luck Junmail Kyoto Sake, stay out of that cave, and tune in for Luck of the Irish Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit:
https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
